properties.name: value
properties.description: set initial value for the input

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: defines first (null) option to display if no option selected

properties.name: title
properties.description: shorthand attribute to fill in label and placeholder

properties.name: onChange
properties.description: function will be called on value change with selected model

properties.name: optionAttribute
properties.description: model property to use for the content of each option
